column4: If I hadn't sworn off programming, this little thing might actually make me want to learn python
I sore off of programming for one reason; I didn't start using pc's till 5 years ago
lol, I stopped programming nearly 20 years ago
if I had the understanding of even one program fro programming I might give it a shot but.... you know... dislexia and programming don't mix and match too well
this time I was right, but, look at my advice thru a lens :)
me thinks me wife is ready for bed, night and see you all tomorrow
- you need the win32 codecs installed?
- mythtv will work on that.. but make sure you use tv card with hardware mpeg encoding - eg pvr-250, etc..
thanks. I know it's slow, and was about to start looking for an adequate card. Thanks for the pointer
- yes, it should be fine - i've got mythtv on a via epia mobo - 600MHz C3 processor... fine and dandy.
no, it's probably because your window manager didn't get started, that's emerald
